net.edzard.kinetic

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • net.edzard.kinetic.Node
        • net.edzard.kinetic.Shape
          • net.edzard.kinetic.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    A line object. Consists of a number of points, which are connected using straight lines. Lines can have a style (e.g. they can be dashed).
    Author:
    Ed

      • getDashes

        public final java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getDashes()
        Retrieve definition of the line style. Line styles are defined by a list of numbers defining the length of a dash, followed by the length of a gap.
        Returns:
        The current line style definition

      • setDashes

        public final void setDashes(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> dashes)
        Assign line style definitions
        Parameters:
        dashes - The line style: a list of numbers defining the length of a dash, followed by the length of a gap.
